name: The Fantasy Chronicles(Downloadable PC version)
description:
The Fantasy Chronicles is now available to download from itch.io!

Talk to villagers,embark on quests,and earn money and XP to upgrade your character.

But most importantly,Season 1 will be released soon(release date TBD),where the 16 laurel wreaths will be unveiled.Download now.

3d version in development!See download instructions for more.
